txt.en: Old Brôg can be found wandering the hillsides to the east of Sardol.\n\nYou have encountered Old Brôg and should defeat him for the good of the people in Blackroot Vale.
You have slain Old Brôg and vanquished a threat to the safety of all that dwell within Blackroot Vale.
You have defeated Old Brôg and his warband.
Old Brôg can be found wandering the hillsides to the east of Sardol.\n\nYou have encountered Old Brôg and should defeat him for the good of the people in Blackroot Vale.
You have defeated Old Brôg and his warband!
Roused by the Ruthless Dead, Old Brôg stalks the hillsides in search of any who have not yet fled to Morlad.

You have encountered the fearsome láthbear, Old Brôg, stalking the vale with his warband. Drawn to Blackroot Vale by the Dead, he must be put down before causing harm to any of the Gondorians in the nearby settlements.
